globals

    trigger                 gg_trg_Melee_Initialization = null

// function blah takes code f returns boolean
// endfunction

function CreateUnitsForPlayer0 takes unit u returns boolean
    // comment
    local unit u = CreateUnit( p, "hrif", 379.5, -619.2, 147.716 ) // unit code hrif should be in single quotes
    local integer realID = 71
    local integer booleanR = false
    local trigger t = rr_SomeOtherTrigger
    local real life = 55.52 // .52
    
    set u = CreateUnit( p, 2, 'hrif', 379.5, -619.2, 147.716 )
    
    if life == 55 then
        call Hello(7, 22)
    elseif not udg_True then
        call ok(myVar, 4, "hello")
    elseif (true or true) and false then
        call Strange("helloWorld", 54, false)
    elseif udg_IsTriggerEnabled then
        call ThisIsTrue(true)
    elseif notEnabled == "notEnabledNope.." then
        call Nope()
        if nope == 'nope' then // if true then
            set nestedIf = true
        endif
    else
        call Yay()
        set helloWorld = "yes this is nice loop if x == 5"
    endif
    
    local unit myNewUnit = CreateUnit(Player(15), 'uloc', 0, 0, 0)
    
    call ChangeIcon("ReplaceableTexture//Units//Human//blah//IronSwords.blp", "")
endfunction

function MyAwesomeThing takes integer i, real r returns nothing
    local integer myInt
    
    // some looping code to print numbers :)
    
    loop
        set i = i - 5
        set i = i*99
        call PrintNumber(i)
        exitwhen i == 14
    endloop
endfunction

function myEmptyFn takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction
